48.ara-name: كتاب الدعوات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ar-Rabi` bin Al-Bara’ bin `Azib reported from, his father:That whenever the Prophet (ﷺ) would return from a trip, he would say: “(We are) Returning, repenting, worshipping, and to our Lord directing the praise (Ā’ibūna tā’būna `ābidūna lirabbinā ḥāmidūn).”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَقُولُ إِذَا قَدِمَ مِنَ السَّفَرِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About What One Says When Returning From His Journey
